column5: Specialise in environmental and sustainable processes while developing the technical, professional and digital skills needed in industry.Our course is for engineers and scientists who want to make a positive impact on the environment, society and the future of our planet. Climate change, GHG emissions and loss of biodiversity are important global issues and the world needs leaders and innovators to design and manage sustainable processes and systems to address these.
